owl:Ontology.dc:title: VSSo: The GENIVI VSS Ontology
owl:Ontology.dc11:description: This ontology describes the car's attributes, branches and signals defined in GENIVI's Vehicle Signal Specification.
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Benjamin Klotz
Raphael Troncy

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Branch
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Branch of the vehicle. Either a component (Body, Chassis...) or the complete vehicle

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Observable signal
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: All observable signals that can dynamically be updated by the vehicle

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Actuable signal
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: All actuable signals that can dynamically be updated by the vehicle

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: part of
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship between 2 branches where one is a component of the second

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has signal
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Property of having signals in a branch

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Attribute
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Attribute signals that do not change during the power cycle of a vehicle.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: position
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: position of the branch within the vehicle

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IdleTime
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.IdleTime : Accumulated idle time in seconds.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: TripMeterReading
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.TripMeterReading : Current trip meter reading

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: TravelledDistance
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.TravelledDistance : Odometer reading

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: DriveTime
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.DriveTime : Accumulated drive time in seconds.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IgnitionOffTime
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.IgnitionOffTime : Accumulated ignition off time in seconds.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IgnitionOnTime
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.IgnitionOnTime : Accumulated ignition on time in seconds.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Vehicle
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.Vehicle : High-vele vehicle data

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: VehicleIdentification
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Attribute.Vehicle.VehicleIdentification : Attributes that identify a vehicle

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Longitudinal
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.Acceleration.Longitudinal : Vehicle acceleration in X (longitudinal acceleration).

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Lateral
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.Acceleration.Lateral : Vehicle acceleration in Y (lateral acceleration).

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Vertical
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.Acceleration.Vertical : Vehicle acceleration in Z (vertical acceleration).

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Acceleration
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.Vehicle.Acceleration : Spacial acceleration

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Pitch
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.AngularVelocity.Pitch : Vehicle rotation rate along Y (lateral).

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Yaw
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.AngularVelocity.Yaw : Vehicle rotation rate along Z (vertical).

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Roll
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.Vehicle.AngularVelocity.Roll : Vehicle rotation rate along X (longitudinal).

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Gyro
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.Vehicle.AngularVelocity : Spacial rotation

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: ADAS
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.ADAS : All Advanced Driver Assist Systems attributes

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ObstacleDetection.IsActive : Indicates if obstacle sensor system is enabled. Tue = Enabled. False = Disabled.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Error
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ObstacleDetection.Error : Indicates if obstacle sensor system incurred an error condition. True = Error. False = No Error.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.TCS.IsEngaged : Indicates if TCS is currently regulating traction. True = Engaged. False = Not Engaged.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IsActive
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.TCS.IsActive : Indicates if TCS is enabled. Tue = Enabled. False = Disabled.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Error
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.TCS.Error : Indicates if TCS incurred an error condition. True = Error. False = No Error.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: TCS
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.ADAS.TCS : Traction Control System signals

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: SpeedSet
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.CruiseControl.SpeedSet : Set cruise control speed in kilometers per hour

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.CruiseControl.IsActive : Indicates if cruise control system is enabled. True = Enabled. False = Disabled.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Error
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.CruiseControl.Error : Indicates if cruise control system incurred and error condition. True = Error. False = NoError.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: CruiseControl
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.ADAS.CruiseControl : Signals from Cruise Control system

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IsEngaged
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ABS.IsEngaged : Indicates if ABS is currently regulating brake pressure. True = Engaged. False = Not Engaged.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IsActive
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ABS.IsActive : Indicates if ABS is enabled. Tue = Enabled. False = Disabled.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Error
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ABS.Error : Indicates if ABS incurred an error condition. True = Error. False = No Error.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: ABS
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.ADAS.ABS : Antilock Braking System signals

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IsEngaged
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ESC.IsEngaged : Indicates if ESC is currently regulating vehicle stability. True = Engaged. False = Not Engaged.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IsActive
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ESC.IsActive : Indicates if ECS is enabled. Tue = Enabled. False = Disabled.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Error
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.ESC.Error : Indicates if ESC incurred an error condition. True = Error. False = No Error.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: ESC
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal/Attribute.ADAS.ESC : Electronic Stability Control System signals

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Warning
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.LaneDepartureDetection.Warning : Indicates if lane departure detection registered a lane departure

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: IsActive
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.LaneDepartureDetection.IsActive : Indicates if lane departure detection system is enabled. True = Enabled. False = Disabled.

rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Error
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: Signal.ADAS.LaneDepartureDetection.Error : Indicates if lane departure system incurred an error condition. True = Error. False = No Error.
